trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Diamond Bar
There were no other sightings in Diamond Bar on or around July 9th 2009
Summary: flashing red lights abrupt direction change
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing by my window to get some fresh air when i noticed and object with a flashing red light. At first i thought it was a plane flying by since planes frequently fly by my area. What caught my attention was that it was moving slower and in the wrong direction. As i was watching, the plane quickly changed directions. it created a sort of zig zag pattern before taking off in the direction that it came. I am confused as to what it was so i thought i would post it to see if anyone else saw it and could tell me what it was.
